bind.jr:constraintMsg: Namba ya kaya lazima iwe kati ya 100 na 999.

text.value: What is sick person suffering from?
Reminder: please talk with the client about the family planning method she's interested in.
Did anyone in the household have a fever yesterday or today?

Where was the birth of child?

Please enter the household follow-up number from the previous visit.
Was anyone in the household coughing today or yesterday?
Did anyone in the household have diarrhea yesterday or today?
Gone to health facility and didn't receive treatment.
Not gone to a health facility.
It's important to make sure you register your newborn after birth. You can't enrol your child into school without a birth registration card.
Do you want to know more about family planning?
It's important for your child to receive all vaccinations before 9 months of age while your child is at increased risk of diseases such as Tetanus, Polio, and TB.
I've started an open sickness referral case. Please visit the health facility, and I'll be back in three days to check up on you.
It's important to make sure you register your newborn after birth. You can't enrol your child into school without a birth registration card.
Was your child's birth registered? (Please ask to see the registration card)

Tafadhali ingiza namba ya iliyopo watu katika daftari.
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anakohoa leo au tokea jana?
Mteja huyu ameadia kuwa kwenya kifaa cha commcare?
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anahoma leo au tokea jana?
Matatizo yanayotokana na uzazi wa mpagno.
Ameenda kituo cha afya na hakupata tiba.
Ameenda kituo cha afya akapata tiba.
Nimetoa rufaa ya mgonjwa. Tafadhali tembelea kituo cha afya, na nitarudi baada ya siku tatu kukuangalia.
Mteja huyu ameadia kuwa kwenya kifaa cha commcare?
Tafadhali ingiza namba ya iliyopo watu katika daftari.
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anakohoa leo au tokea jana?
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anaharisha leo au tokea jana?
Je kuna rufaa ya ugonjwa uliyotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anahoma leo au tokea jana?
Kuna mtoto mchanga aliyezaliwa kwenye kaya hii tangu CHP alipotembelea?
Je kuna mtoto mwenye umri chini ya miaka 2?
Ulitembelewa na mhudumu wa afya wa kutoa mafunzo (elimu) kwa mtoto mchanga?
Ni muhimu mtoto wako kupata chanjo zote kabla ya miezi 9. Mtoto wako umri huu ni hatari anaweza kupata magonjwa kama: Tetanus, Polio, na TB.
Ungependa kujua zaidi juu ya uzazi wa mpango?
Kwa mtoto wako amepata chanjo zote inavyostahili?
Je kuna rufaa uliyotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Ulitembelewa na mhudumu wa afya wa kutoa mafunzo (elimu) kwa mtoto mchanga?
Mtoto wako alipozaliwa alisajliwa? (Tafadhali uliza na uone kadi/cheti)
Ni muhumu sana kuhakikisha kama mtoto alozaliwa umemwa ndikisha (kasajiliwa) baada ya kujifungua. Hutaweza kumwandikisha mtoto wako shule bila kuwa na cheti za kuzaliwa.
Ni muhumu sana kuhakikisha kama mtoto alozaliwa umemwa ndikisha (kasajiliwa) baada ya kujifungua. Hutaweza kumwandikisha mtoto wako shule bila kuwa na cheti za kuzaliwa.
Mtoto wako alipozaliwa alisajliwa? (Tafadhali uliza na uone kadi/cheti)
Chagua rufaa ulizotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Mteja huyu ameadia kuwa kwenya kifaa cha Commcare?
Namba yetu ya leo ya ufuatiliaji wa kaya ni . Tafadhali andika namba hii kwenye kitabu cha mteja wako.
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anakohoa leo au tokea jana?
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anahoma leo au tokea jana?
Kuna mtoto mchanga aliyezaliwa kwenye kaya hii tangu CHP alipotembelea?
Idadi ya watoto waliozaliwa kwenye kaya hii?
Je kuna mtoto mwenye umri chini ya miaka 2?
Kwa mtoto wako amepata chanjo zote inavyostahili?
Ni muhimu mtoto wako kupata chanjo zote kabla ya miezi 9. Mtoto wako umri huu ni hatari anaweza kupata magonjwa kama: Tetanus, Polio, na TB.
Ungependa kujua zaidi juu ya uzazi wa mpango?
Chagua rufaa ulizotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Je kuna rufaa ya ugonjwa uliyotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Nimetoa rufaa ya mgonjwa. Tafadhali tembelea kituo cha afya, na nitarudi baada ya siku tatu kukuangalia.
Mtoto wako alipozaliwa alisajliwa? (Tafadhali uliza na uone kadi/cheti)
Kuna mtu kwenye kaya yako ambaye anaharisha leo au tokea jana?
Je kuna rufaa uliyotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Ni aina ipi ya uzazi wa mpango unqependa kujua zaidi?
Tafadhali ingiza namba ya ufuatiliaji wa kaya iliyoandikwa kwenye kitabu cha nyumbani mara ya mwisho ulipotembelea kaya hii.
Tafadhali sana kumbuka kumuandikisha mama huyu kwenye orodha ya wajawazito
